monitoringConfiguration.name: ICT Governance Continuous Compliance Monitoring
monitoringConfiguration.description: Real-time compliance monitoring configuration for ICT governance framework

monitoringRules.name: critical_system_access_violation
monitoringRules.description: Unauthorized access attempts to Tier 1 critical systems
monitoringRules.query: SigninLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) and AppDisplayName in ('ERP System', 'Financial Management System', 'HR Management System', 'Customer Database') and ResultType != 0 | extend FailureReason = case(ResultType == 50126, 'Invalid credentials', ResultType == 50053, 'Account locked', ResultType == 50057, 'User disabled', 'Other failure')

monitoringRules.name: bulk_data_download
monitoringRules.description: Potential data exfiltration - bulk file downloads detected
monitoringRules.query: CloudAppEvents | where TimeGenerated > ago(10m) and ActionType == 'FileDownloaded' | summarize DownloadCount = count(), TotalSize = sum(ObjectSize) by AccountObjectId, UserPrincipalName | where DownloadCount > 50 or TotalSize > 1000000000

monitoringRules.name: policy_exception_threshold_breach
monitoringRules.description: Policy exception threshold exceeded - potential policy abuse
monitoringRules.query: PolicyExceptions_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | summarize ExceptionCount = count() by PolicyName_s, RequestedBy_s | where ExceptionCount > 3

monitoringRules.name: privileged_access_misuse
monitoringRules.description: Privileged access used outside normal business hours or patterns
monitoringRules.query: AuditLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) and Category == 'RoleManagement' and ActivityDisplayName contains 'Add' | extend Hour = datetime_part('hour', TimeGenerated) | where Hour < 6 or Hour > 22 | project TimeGenerated, InitiatedBy, TargetResources, ActivityDisplayName

monitoringRules.name: security_control_failure
monitoringRules.description: Multiple security control failures indicating potential compromise
monitoringRules.query: SecurityRecommendation | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) and RecommendationState == 'Active' and RecommendationSeverity in ('High', 'Medium') | summarize FailureCount = count() by RecommendationName | where FailureCount > 10

monitoringRules.name: compliance_drift_detection
monitoringRules.query: ComplianceScore_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) | summarize CurrentScore = avg(Score_d) by Domain_s | join (ComplianceScore_CL | where TimeGenerated between (ago(2h) .. ago(90m)) | summarize PreviousScore = avg(Score_d) by Domain_s) on Domain_s | where CurrentScore < PreviousScore - 5 | extend DriftPercentage = ((PreviousScore - CurrentScore) / PreviousScore) * 100

monitoringRules.name: shadow_it_detection
monitoringRules.description: Unauthorized cloud applications or services detected
monitoringRules.query: CloudAppEvents | where TimeGenerated > ago(20m) and Application !in (dynamic(['Microsoft 365', 'Azure', 'Salesforce', 'ServiceNow'])) | summarize UniqueUsers = dcount(AccountObjectId), EventCount = count() by Application | where UniqueUsers > 5 or EventCount > 100

monitoringRules.name: configuration_drift
monitoringRules.description: Critical infrastructure configuration changes outside change windows
monitoringRules.query: AzureActivity | where TimeGenerated > ago(10m) and CategoryValue == 'Administrative' and OperationNameValue contains 'write' and ResourceGroup in ('rg-prod-critical', 'rg-prod-database') | extend Hour = datetime_part('hour', TimeGenerated) | where Hour < 8 or Hour > 18

monitoringRules.name: anomalous_user_behavior
monitoringRules.description: User behavior patterns indicating potential account compromise
monitoringRules.query: BehaviorAnalytics | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) and ActivityType == 'Anomalous' and InvestigationPriority in ('High', 'Medium') | summarize AnomalousActivities = count() by UserPrincipalName | where AnomalousActivities > 3

monitoringRules.name: regulatory_compliance_breach
monitoringRules.query: ComplianceEvents_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) and ComplianceFramework_s in ('GDPR', 'SOX', 'HIPAA', 'PCI-DSS') and ViolationType_s in ('Data Breach', 'Access Violation', 'Retention Violation') | project TimeGenerated, ComplianceFramework_s, ViolationType_s, AffectedData_s, UserPrincipalName_s

monitoringRules.name: itil_sla_breach
monitoringRules.description: ITIL service level agreement breach detected
monitoringRules.query: ServiceLevelEvents_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) and SLAStatus_s == 'Breached' and ServiceCategory_s in ('Critical', 'High') | project TimeGenerated, ServiceName_s, SLAType_s, ActualValue_d, TargetValue_d, BreachDuration_s

monitoringRules.name: itil_incident_escalation
monitoringRules.description: ITIL incident requiring escalation due to resolution time breach
monitoringRules.query: IncidentManagement_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(10m) and Status_s == 'Open' and Priority_s in ('P1', 'P2') and ResolutionTimeMinutes_d > case(Priority_s == 'P1', 240, Priority_s == 'P2', 480, 1440) | project TimeGenerated, IncidentId_s, Priority_s, Category_s, AssignedTo_s, ResolutionTimeMinutes_d

monitoringRules.name: itil_change_failure
monitoringRules.description: ITIL change implementation failure requiring immediate attention
monitoringRules.query: ChangeManagement_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) and ChangeStatus_s == 'Failed' and ChangeType_s in ('Emergency', 'Standard', 'Normal') and ImpactLevel_s in ('High', 'Critical') | project TimeGenerated, ChangeId_s, ChangeType_s, ImpactLevel_s, FailureReason_s, RequestedBy_s

monitoringRules.name: itil_service_availability_degradation
monitoringRules.description: ITIL service availability below acceptable thresholds
monitoringRules.query: ServiceAvailability_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(20m) | summarize AvgAvailability = avg(AvailabilityPercentage_d) by ServiceName_s | where AvgAvailability < 99.5 and ServiceName_s in ('Email Service', 'ERP System', 'Customer Portal', 'Financial System')

monitoringRules.name: itil_problem_recurrence
monitoringRules.description: ITIL problem recurrence indicating ineffective resolution
monitoringRules.query: ProblemManagement_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h) and Status_s == 'Resolved' | summarize RecurrenceCount = count() by ProblemCategory_s, RootCause_s | where RecurrenceCount > 3 | project ProblemCategory_s, RootCause_s, RecurrenceCount

monitoringRules.name: itil_service_request_backlog
monitoringRules.description: ITIL service request backlog exceeding acceptable limits
monitoringRules.query: ServiceRequests_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) and Status_s == 'Open' | summarize BacklogCount = count() by RequestType_s | where BacklogCount > 50 | project RequestType_s, BacklogCount

monitoringRules.name: itil_configuration_drift
monitoringRules.description: ITIL configuration item drift from approved baseline
monitoringRules.query: ConfigurationManagement_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) and DriftStatus_s == 'Detected' and CIType_s in ('Server', 'Database', 'Network Device') and Environment_s == 'Production' | project TimeGenerated, CIName_s, CIType_s, DriftType_s, BaselineVersion_s, CurrentVersion_s

monitoringRules.name: itil_service_performance_degradation
monitoringRules.description: ITIL service performance metrics below acceptable thresholds
monitoringRules.query: ServicePerformance_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) | summarize AvgResponseTime = avg(ResponseTimeMs_d), AvgThroughput = avg(ThroughputTPS_d) by ServiceName_s | where AvgResponseTime > 5000 or AvgThroughput < 100 | project ServiceName_s, AvgResponseTime, AvgThroughput

monitoringRules.name: itil_supplier_sla_breach
monitoringRules.description: ITIL supplier service level agreement breach
monitoringRules.query: SupplierSLA_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(15m) and SLAStatus_s == 'Breached' and SupplierTier_s in ('Critical', 'Strategic') | project TimeGenerated, SupplierName_s, ServiceType_s, SLAMetric_s, ActualValue_d, TargetValue_d

critical.subject: 🚨 CRITICAL: Compliance Violation - Immediate Action Required

high.subject: ⚠️ HIGH: Compliance Violation - Urgent Response Needed

low.subject: ℹ️ LOW: Compliance Notice - For Information

messageTemplates.critical: CRITICAL ALERT: {ruleName} - {violationCount} violations detected. Check dashboard immediately. Time: {detectionTime}
messageTemplates.high: HIGH ALERT: {ruleName} - Review required. Check governance dashboard.

critical-access-violation.description: Automated response for critical system access violations

actions.name: notify_security
actions.description: Send immediate notification to security team

data-exfiltration.description: Automated response for potential data exfiltration

actions.name: block_downloads
actions.description: Block further file downloads for the user

actions.name: escalate_monitoring
actions.description: Increase monitoring for the user account

actions.name: notify_legal
actions.description: Notify legal team for regulatory assessment

actions.name: assess_breach_scope
actions.description: Assess the scope of the potential breach
